creator: andy@esolution.co.uk
text:
see bug http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15776. This dosnt seem
to work on any port for me using redhat7.2.

Deleting $CATALINA_HOME/bin/tomcat-jni.jar resolved this for me.  The classes 
in tomcat-jni conflict with the classes in $CATALINA_HOME/server/lib/tomcat-
jk2.jar.
creator: noel@devtech.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 15776 ***
creator: markt@apache.org
